subject: Basketball
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. player Eddie Griffin had more than three times the legal alcohol limit in his system when he crashed his sport utility vehicle into a moving train and died this summer, according to an autopsy report released yesterday. Griffin, 25, was killed on Aug. 17.
